label: Ensure accuracy, timeliness, and completeness of assignments and tasks.
quote: The contractor shall be responsible for ensuring the accuracy, timeliness and completeness of assignments and tasks.

label: Ability to use office automation software to produce documents, forms, and reports; transmit and receive documents electronically.
quote: 3.1.1 Ability to use office automation software with varied functions to produce a wide range of documents, forms, reports etc. Transmit and receive documents and messages electronically using government furnished computers or workstations.

label: Ability to obtain and manipulate data and generate reports from automated systems.
quote: 3.1.2 Ability to obtain and manipulate data and generate reports from automated systems.

label: Ability to maintain records in accordance with CBP guidelines.
quote: 3.1.3 Ability to maintain records in accordance with CBP guidelines.

label: Ability to prepare multiple forms of communication for distribution internal and external to CBP.
quote: 3.1.4 Ability to prepare multiple forms of communication for distribution an internal and external to CBP.

label: Knowledge of special retirement coverage (LEO, CBPO).
quote: 3.1.5 Knowledge of special retirement coverage, i.e. Law Enforcement Officer (LEO), Customs and Border Protection Officer CBPO).

label: Experience using office equipment, including computers, scanners, and copiers.
quote: 3.2.1 Must have experience using office equipment, including computers, scanners, and copiers.

label: Experience using Adobe Acrobat Pro and Microsoft Office (Word/Excel/PowerPoint/Outlook).
quote: 3.2.2 Must have experience using Adobe Acrobat Pro and Microsoft Office (Word/Excel/PowerPoint/Outlook).

label: Experience maintaining a consistent high-volume workflow while maintaining accurate task completion.
quote: 3.2.3 Must have experience maintaining a consistent high-volume workflow while maintain accurate task completion.

label: Experience learning new/agency specific computer systems (e.g., Salesforce, FedHR navigator).
quote: 3.2.4 Must have experience learning new/agency specific computer systems (i.e., Salesforce, FedHR navigator, etc.)

label: Experience as an effective communicator (oral and written).
quote: 3.2.5 Must have experience as an effective communicator (oral and written).

label: Experience working with individuals and diverse groups.
quote: 3.2.6 Must have experience working with individuals and diverse groups.

label: Ability to pass pre-employment and periodic background investigations.
quote: 3.2.7 Must be able to pass pre-employment and periodic background investigations.
